item.description:
We have talked about vision boards before but we never covered it the way we will tonight!. We will talk about the energy around the boards and why they work so well. I encourage those of you that want to keep yourself surrounded by that energy to pick up a journal or photo album type book to create something even sturdier and portable.
Please start tearing pages out of magazines and newspapers. Use catalogs and advertisements. If you can't find it then we will draw it!
Start thinking, what do you want? If you could have,do or be anything what would it be????
We will create the piece that night and send you home energized and focused on your goals!
The Center will supply the glue, scissors and markers. We Will assist in ideas and giving pep talks about the law of attraction while you are working. It is rarely ever quite here, as you know!
See you for a fun and creative time!
Namaste~
Barb

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Vision Boards, What they are and how to use them.
